text.section: The Department may administer the programs by providing monthly housing assistance payments to or on behalf of eligible households directly or through political subdivisions, their local housing agencies or departments, or nonprofit organizations.

In establishing the programs, the Department shall consult with, as appropriate:
the Department of Human Resources;
the Department of Disabilities; or
any other unit of State or local government.
The Secretary may establish different criteria for different programs.
